notes.title: üíç HOUSTON JUST-MARRIED CHECKLIST
notes.content:
üíç HOUSTON JUST-MARRIED CHECKLIST

Texas Newlywed Admin Reset
Name changes are optional. If you are not changing names, skip all name-change steps and jump straight to HR, insurance, and voter updates.

‚úÖ STEP-BY-STEP MASTER CHECKLIST

1. File Your Marriage License
2. Order Certified Copies
3. Social Security Name Update (IF changing name)
4. Texas DPS Driver License / ID
5. Passport Update (IF applicable)
6. Employers + Benefits Updates
7. Banks & Credit Accounts
8. Insurance & Medical Records
9. Texas Voter Registration
10. Catch-All Misc Updates

notes.title: STEP 1 ‚Äî Marriage License Tips
notes.content:
Your marriage is not legally recorded until your license is returned to the county clerk.

  • Texas allows mail or in-person return.
  • Houston & Galveston couples strongly prefer in-person so nothing gets lost.
  • Your officiant usually handles this ‚Äî but confirm it was filed anyway.

Once recorded, your clerk mails your original certificate back within 1‚Äì2 weeks.

notes.title: STEP 2 ‚Äî Certified Copies Guide
notes.content:
Certified copies are official duplicates with raised seals.

  • You will need them to change your name and update benefits.
  • Order 2‚Äì3 copies minimum.
  • Cheaper and faster to order extras now than later.
  • Request from the county where your license was issued.

notes.title: STEP 3 ‚Äî Social Security Update
notes.content:
Your name does NOT change automatically when you marry. SS update must come first.

  • Wait ~30 days after wedding for record processing.
  • Complete Form SS-5 and either visit SSA office (fastest) or mail docs.
  • Bring marriage certificate, ID, completed SS-5. No fee.
  • New SS card arrives in 1‚Äì2 weeks.

SSA Sensory Tips

  • Offices can have metal detectors and fluorescent lights.
  • Go early mid-week; bring noise-canceling headphones or fidgets.

notes.title: STEP 4 ‚Äî Texas DPS ID Update
notes.content:
Texas requires you to update your driver ID after a name change. Appointments only.

  • Book early‚ÄîHouston slots fill weeks out; suburban offices quieter.
  • Bring marriage certificate, current ID, SS receipt.
  • Fee: ~$11; temp paper license same day, permanent by mail in 2‚Äì3 weeks.

DPS Sensory Tips

  • Mega-centers are loud. Request corner seating or wait outside until called.

notes.title: STEP 5 ‚Äî Passport Update
notes.content:
If changing your name internationally, update your passport:

  • <1 yr old ‚Üí DS-5504 (FREE)
  • >1 yr old ‚Üí DS-82 ($130 + shipping)
  • Mail passport, photo, marriage certificate copy, and form.

Processing: ~8‚Äì11 weeks. If traveling soon, wait until after travel so tickets match.

notes.title: STEP 6 ‚Äî Employers & Benefits
notes.content:
Your payroll name must match SSA. Notify HR once SS card arrives.

  • Update payroll, health insurance, life & retirement beneficiaries.
  • Deadline: 30 days post-wedding.

HR Script

‚ÄúHi, I recently got married and changed my legal name to ______. My SS record is updated; can you update payroll and benefits?‚Äù

notes.title: STEP 7 ‚Äî Banks & Credit
notes.content:
Most banks require you to update name in-branch.

  • Bring new ID and marriage certificate.
  • Request updated debit & credit cards and checks.

Teller Script

‚ÄúI need to update my account name after marriage. Here‚Äôs my new ID and certificate.‚Äù

notes.title: STEP 8 ‚Äî Insurance & Medical
notes.content:
Update all policies and medical records:

  • Health, auto, home/renters insurance
  • Request new insurance ID cards
  • Notify doctor & dentist offices

notes.title: STEP 9 ‚Äî Texas Voter Update
notes.content: Update your voter registration via the Texas Voter Online portal or mail in a form. Do before any election to avoid check-in issues.

notes.title: STEP 10 ‚Äî Misc Updates
notes.content:
No rush‚Äîupdate these casually:

  • Credit cards, loans & investments
  • Utilities, subscriptions & rewards
  • Professional licenses & social profiles

Carry an extra marriage certificate copy during this period.

notes.title: üíõ Final Notes
notes.content:
• Name change is optional‚Äîyour marriage is valid regardless.
  • You can change names months or years later‚Äîno deadline.
  • Each spouse must file paperwork separately.
  • All steps here are DIY & free‚Äîno paid kits needed.

This admin phase is slow but temporary. Handle it gently, one step at a time. No rush‚Äîyou‚Äôre doing great.
